name: Cherubimon
effect: When you would play this card from your hand, you may delete 1 of your purple [Cherubimon] to reduce this card's play cost by 8.[On Play][When Digivolving] For each Tamer you have in play, activate the effect below.・1 of your opponent's Digimon gets ＜Security Attack -2＞ until the end of your opponent's next turn. (This Digimon checks 2 fewer security cards.)
